entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FormatDocument command adding multiple line feeds in between methods when original file has mixed line endings #69495
  • EnC: Deleting record method that shadows a synthesized one and contains stackalloc may crash the app #69493
  • csharp_style_allow_embedded_statements_on_same_line_experimental and csharp_new_line_before_open_brace colide #69490

Closed

  • `SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers` isn't cached causing 4% allocations of `SubstitutedMethodSymbol` #69163
    17.8
  • Compiler doesn't enforce init-only property assignments in a copy constructor #68346
    17.8
  • Rename doubles characters when identifier is at the end of the document #68375
    17.8 P4
  • Support undo for Complete Statement feature #37577
    Backlog
  • Test Plan: ref readonly #68056
    C# 12.0
  • Resolve ambiguities and breaking changes due to mismatches introduced with `ref readonly` parameters #69229
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • When anonymous function has explicit return and parameters, don't bind just to determine if conversion exists #69503
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Share common code in 'use collection expression'. #69502
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move csharp decompiler service down to features so it is available in vscode #69501
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code like `ImmutableArray.CreateBuilder<int>(); ...` to a collection expression. #69500
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Fix analyzer conflicts on Linux (#69406)" #69498
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Reduce LOH allocations for SemanticToken classification in LSP #69496
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Cache SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers to avoid unnecessary allocations #69164
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix regression for suppressed diagnostics in Suggestion diagnostics tagger #69492
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Only show toast when project load fails #69494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix lack of constructor exit warnings in copy constructors #69468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Complete `ref readonly` test plan #69474
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next
  • Unify `ref readonly` with `in` parameter behavior where it currently differs #69235
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next
  • Document and test `ref readonly` breaking change #69437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.8
  • Improve error recovery when encountering errant close-paren tokens. #69482
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions` allocations by caching them in AssemblySymbol #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add BuildOnlyDiagnosticIds LSP request handler #69475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • IDE changes for analyzer loading #69470
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
